page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = GrantAccess(Name as C, AccessType as C [, Resource as C])

arguments.argument: Result_Flag Name TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The name of a user or group.

argument.name: AccessType
argument.description: The type of access to grant.

argument.name: Resource
argument.description: Optional. The name of a resource to control.

page.description: Grant to a user or group the access specified, optionally, on the resource named.
page.discussion: The GrantAccess() method grants to a user or group the access specified to the named resource.
